1.title: Fresh Tracks
1.plot: Early riding with Jake Blauvelt in British Columbia and the Pacific Northwest. Follow Jake as he finds his snowboard groove after the long summer break.

2.title: Double Vision
2.plot: British Columbia backcountry lodge trip with Jake Blauvelt and Nicolas Mueller.

3.title: Park Life
3.plot: Jake Blauvelt, Mason Aguirre, Matt Ladley, Terje Haakonsen and Gjermund Braaten and others take part in a progressive park shoot on one of Norway's glaciers.

4.title: Due South
4.plot: Season finalÃ©: Jake Blauvelt, Matt Ladley and Eric Jackson travel to the South American Andes of Chile.

imdb.plot outline: From the producers of Tracking Eero and Terje's Season Pass, this visually stunning four-part mini series follows professional snowboarder, Jake Blauvelt, to his new home in the Pacific Northwest for early season backcountry riding. Then Jake sets his sights on a first class worldwide adventure with Alaskan heli-trips, B.C. sessions, Northern European runs, and shredding the Andes of Argentina and Chile with a prestigious crew of top snowboarders, including Swiss snowboarder Nicolas Müller.
imdb.title: Blauvelt's Backcountry
plot: From the producers of Tracking Eero and Terje's Season Pass, this visually stunning four-part mini series follows professional snowboarder, Jake Blauvelt, to his new home in the Pacific Northwest for early season backcountry riding. Then Jake sets his sights on a first class worldwide adventure with Alaskan heli-trips, B.C. sessions, Northern European runs, and shredding the Andes of Argentina and Chile with a prestigious crew of top snowboarders, including Swiss snowboarder Nicolas Müller.
